title: Simple and direct electrochemical detection of rosmarinic acid in food samples based on nanochannel modified carbon electrode
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,18599-18607
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03063J, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Wenbo Chen, Hongjuan Ru, Fei Yan, Xianwei Mo
A simple electrochemical sensor was developed by integrating a vertically-ordered mesoporous silica film (VMSF) with a pre-activated glassy carbon electrode (p-GCE) to provide dual signal amplification for sensitive detection of rosmarinic acid.
